returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: There is no guarantee that a given association handler will support a particular selection, especially if multiple items are selected. Before attempting to invoke the selection via this method, it is recommended to call .

summary.para: Determines whether an invoker supports its selection.

returns.para: Returns S_OK if this instance supports its selection, or S_FALSE otherwise.

remarks.para: For example, this method should return whether an application (as selected from an "Open With" context menu) can Open a file.

summary.para: Exposes methods that invoke an associated application handler.
